nl.esciencecenter.neon.math

Class FloatMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.neon.math.FloatMatrix
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Float2Matrix, Float3Matrix, Float4Matrix

    public abstract class FloatMatrix
extends Object
    Abstract class for all Matrices that provides several utility functions.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen
